pr_title: Run tests against PredictionsCategory, not Amplify

timeline.message: Run tests against PredictionsCategory, not Amplify

timeline.bodyText:
It should be okay to re-init the mobile client in @Before, right? The benefit is, it gets all this setup stuff back into just few lines inside of one method body. Also, a guaranteed baseline before each @Test (for the win!)
Singletons and static fields are sort of anti-pattern; I think we should aim to reduce our use of @BeforeClass (we use it more than most (quality) code bases I have seen, right now.)
timeline.author: jamesonwilliams

replies.bodyText: Yea, they would do the same thing, but I think leaving it as is is good to remind us that AWSMobileClient is a singleton.
replies.author: raphkim
